oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-04-21 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from April 21, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Cowboy Copas (host/performer), guest performers the Louvin Brothers, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Johnny Toney (name unconfirmed), Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Grandpa Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chet Atkins; Minnie Pearl; Louvin Brothers; Grandpa Jones; Cowboy Copas
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Cowboy Copas introduces Chet Atkins -- St. Louis Blues (Chet Atkins) -- Cowboy Copas introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl, Cowboy Copas) -- Cowboy Copas introduces the Louvin Brothers -- When I Stop Dreaming (Louvin Brothers) -- Cowboy Copas introduces Grandpa Jones -- Rock Island Line (Grandpa Jones) -- Cowboy Copas talks -- Don't Shake Hands With The Devil (Cowboy Copas) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Cowboy Copas) -- Cavalier Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Hay, George D.
